## Input Data

```{r}
# network
combined_metab_gene_hallmarks <- read_csv("../support/combined_metab_gene_hallmarks.csv")
network_lung <- combined_metab_gene_hallmarks
network_lung$mor <- 1
network_lung$term <- gsub("HALLMARK_","", network_lung$term)
network_lung$term <- gsub("_", " ", network_lung$term)
```
